dcterms:creator: Tristan Thrush
Jared Moore
Miguel Monares
Christopher Potts
Douwe Kiela
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to test the ability of language models to generate and understand self-referential statements, focusing on metalinguistic capabilities. It includes examples for generation and verification tasks, with a total of 208 examples, including controls for non-self-referential statements.
dcterms:title: I am a Strange Dataset

dcterms:description: A set of 10 examples that are particularly challenging and were difficult for expert annotators to understand without explanations. These examples are not included in the main dataset and serve as a separate challenge.
dcterms:title: I am an Impossible Dataset
